document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Susan </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">itself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">Bliss </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whatever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Realm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">forfeit, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">Lord, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">Continue </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: To own a Susan of my own
